scripts.build: yarn run build:js:prod && yarn run build:css
scripts.build:dev: yarn run build:js:dev && yarn run build:css
scripts.build:css: yarn run build:css:modern && yarn run build:css:legacy
scripts.build:css:modern: for file in public/source/themes/modern/*.less; do lessc --clean-css $file public/dist/assets/themes/modern/$(basename $file .less).css; done
scripts.build:css:legacy: for file in public/source/themes/legacy/*.less; do lessc --clean-css $file public/dist/assets/themes/legacy/$(basename $file .less).css; done
